description: This file defines a media trend analysis agent using the 'agno' framework. It sets up an agent with specific tools, description, instructions, and example prompts for analyzing media trends based on keywords and sources.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that performs media trend analysis with specified tools, description, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: Tools for performing external data analysis or searches.

classes.name: FirecrawlTools
classes.description: Tools for web crawling and scraping.

methods.name: calculate_start_date
methods.description: Calculates a start date string based on the number of days ago.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print the response from the agent based on a given prompt.
